diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test barometric pressure sensor voltage, check wiring and connector, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Inspect vacuum hose for cracks or clogs, test MAP sensor output, check for intake leaks

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check MAP sensor vacuum line, test sensor voltage, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test MAP sensor output voltage, check wiring for short to battery, replace sensor

description: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test IAT sensor resistance at known temperature, inspect wiring and connector, replace sensor

description: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit Low
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test IAT sensor resistance, check wiring for ground short, replace sensor

description: Intake Air Temperature Sensor Circuit High
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check IAT sensor connector, test for open circuit, replace sensor

description: Cylinder Head Temperature Sensor Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test CHT sensor resistance at operating temperature, inspect wiring, replace sensor

description: Cylinder Head Temperature Sensor Circuit Low
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test CHT sensor resistance, check wiring for ground short, replace sensor

description: Cylinder Head Temperature Sensor Circuit High
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Inspect connector, test wiring continuity, replace CHT sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test TPS voltage sweep, clean throttle body, replace TPS if erratic

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check TPS wiring, test signal voltage, replace TPS

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test TPS voltage, check for short to battery, replace TPS

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check for exhaust leaks, test O2 sensor heater circuit, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check for lean condition causes, test sensor output, replace if stuck low

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check for rich condition, test sensor response, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check intake boot clamps, test fuel pressure, clean injector, inspect airbox

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Replace air filter, check fuel pressure, test O2 sensor, inspect injector

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test injector resistance (11-16 ohms typical), check wiring, replace injector

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check fuel pump fuse, test relay operation, verify fuel pump power and ground, replace relay

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test injector resistance, check wiring for ground short, replace injector

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test injector resistance, check connector, inspect wiring for open circuit, replace injector

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clean IAC valve and passages, test IAC motor operation, check for vacuum leaks

description: Idle Air Control System RPM Lower Than Expected
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clean throttle body and IAC passages, check for vacuum leaks, replace IAC valve

description: Idle Air Control System RPM Higher Than Expected
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check for vacuum leaks, clean or replace IAC valve, adjust throttle cable free play

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Replace spark plug, test ignition coil, check fuel pressure, inspect for vacuum leaks

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Replace spark plug, test ignition coil resistance, check compression, test injector

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test CKP sensor resistance, check air gap, inspect trigger wheel for damage, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check CKP sensor air gap, clean sensor tip, inspect trigger wheel, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test CMP sensor resistance, check wiring, verify installation, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check cam chain tension, test CMP sensor, verify valve timing, replace sensor or adjust chain

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test coil primary and secondary resistance, check wiring, replace ignition coil

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test coil secondary resistance, inspect spark plug cap, replace ignition coil

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check cooling fan fuse, test relay, verify fan motor operation, check coolant temp switch

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check for speed sensor fault, verify ECU calibration, avoid sustained redline operation

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test battery voltage, check charging output at idle and RPM, inspect stator and regulator/rectifier

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test charging voltage (should not exceed 14.8V), replace regulator/rectifier, test battery

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clear code and retest, check ECU connector for corrosion, inspect for water damage, replace ECU

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check ECU power supply voltage, inspect ECU mounting for heat exposure, replace ECU

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check MIL bulb, test wiring from ECU to instrument cluster, replace bulb or repair wiring

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test 5V reference at sensor connectors, check for shorts in TPS/MAP wiring, inspect ECU

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test igniter module, check coil driver wiring, replace igniter or ECU

description: Fuel Tank Pressure Sensor Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check fuel cap seal, test pressure sensor, inspect wiring, replace sensor

description: EVAP Purge Control Valve Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test purge valve solenoid, check wiring, inspect charcoal canister, replace valve

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Tighten or replace fuel cap, inspect EVAP hoses for cracks, smoke test EVAP system

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check secondary air valve operation, inspect air passages for carbon buildup, replace reed valve

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test speed sensor output, check wiring and connector, inspect drive gear, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check speed sensor signal with oscilloscope, verify tire size, adjust sensor gap, replace sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check oil level, test oil pressure with mechanical gauge, replace oil pressure sensor

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test fuel level sender resistance, check wiring, inspect float mechanism, replace sender

description: Front Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit Malfunction
common_causes: Debris on sensor or tone ring
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clean sensor and tone ring, check sensor air gap, test sensor resistance, replace sensor

description: Front Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Erratic
common_causes: Wheel bearing play causing sensor gap change
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Inspect tone ring for damage or debris, check wheel bearing play, test wiring, replace sensor

description: Rear Wheel Speed Sensor Circuit Malfunction
common_causes: Debris on sensor or tone ring
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clean sensor and tone ring, check air gap, test sensor resistance, replace sensor

description: Rear Wheel Speed Sensor Signal Erratic
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Inspect rear tone ring, check wheel bearing, test wiring continuity, replace sensor

description: Front ABS Solenoid Valve Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test solenoid resistance, check wiring, inspect ABS hydraulic unit, replace ABS modulator

description: Rear ABS Solenoid Valve Circuit Malfunction
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Test solenoid resistance, check wiring, inspect ABS hydraulic unit, replace ABS modulator

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check ABS fuse, test pump motor, inspect wiring, replace ABS hydraulic unit if needed

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Clear code and retest, check ABS module connector for corrosion, inspect for water damage, replace ABS module

description: High Speed CAN Communication Bus Fault
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check CAN bus wiring, measure bus resistance (should be ~60 ohms), inspect connectors, isolate faulty module

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Inspect CAN bus wiring for shorts, check termination, disconnect modules one at a time to isolate fault

diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check ECU fuse, verify ECU power and ground, inspect CAN bus wiring, replace ECU if necessary

description: Lost Communication with ABS Control Module
common_causes: CAN bus wiring fault to ABS
diagnostic_method: OBD-II scanner or Kymco diagnostic tool (blink codes)
fix_reference: Check ABS module fuse, verify power and ground at ABS module, inspect CAN wiring, replace ABS module
